manager_subtitle: Manage templates, create new ones or let AI generate
delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete template "{{name}}"
page_description_select: Select a card template to generate Anki cards.
page_description_management: Manage your Anki card templates, including creating, editing, deleting, and setting default templates.
empty_description: Click the "Create" button to create your first template.
form_template_help: Use {{Field Name}} to insert field content
form_generation_prompt_placeholder: Guide AI on how to generate card content
form_generation_prompt_help: This prompt will be passed to the AI model to guide card content generation. Ensure it is clear and specific.
recommend_simplify: Recommend simplifying template for better reliability
field_type_configuration_help: Configure data types and validation rules for each field to help AI generate more accurate content
field_description_placeholder: Describe the purpose of this field
field_ai_hint_placeholder: Extra hints for AI, e.g., Generate 3-5 bullet points
complex_template_warning: Complex templates may require more AI processing time. Please design field structures reasonably

field_type_help.array: List of strings, such as tags or bullet points (will be converted to comma-separated text)
field_type_help.number: Numeric value (will be converted to text)
field_type_help.boolean: Yes/No option (will be converted to text)
field_type_help.date: Date and time (will be formatted as text)
field_type_help.rich_text: Text supporting Markdown or HTML format (will be converted to plain text or simple HTML)

select_at_least_one: Please select at least one template to export
permission_denied: Target directory is out of application authorization scope, please select system directories like Desktop, Documents, Downloads and try again.
dialog_unavailable_clipboard:
Save dialog unavailable, template JSON copied to clipboard:
{{name}}
dialog_unavailable_no_clipboard: Save dialog unavailable and cannot copy to clipboard, please manually copy template data from console.
dialog_unavailable_batch: Save dialog unavailable, template JSON copied to clipboard.
basic_info_desc: Set template's basic properties and description
template_name_hint: Give template a clear name for easy finding and recognition
generation_prompt_required_error: Generation prompt is required. Add core requirements in Advanced Settings.
field_rules_missing: Missing extraction rules for fields: {{fields}}. Add rules or remove those fields.
field_rules_extra: Extraction rules exist for fields not in the template: {{fields}}. Remove or add those fields.
author: Author
front_template_desc: Write front card template using Mustache syntax
back_template_desc: Write back card template using Mustache syntax
generation_prompt_hint: Define rules and requirements for AI to follow when generating card content
full_prompt_preview_desc: Rules and requirements for AI to follow when generating card content
preview_data_desc: Define sample data used for preview
preview_data_usage: Preview data is used to display template effects in template management page.
click_generate_json: Click "Generate Template" to automatically generate JSON structure based on current fields.
core_requirements_placeholder:
Describe core requirements and generation rules for this type of card, for example:

Generate programming concept cards. Requirements:
1. Concept explanation should be concise and accurate
2. Must include actual code examples
3. Code should have appropriate comments
4. Difficulty suitable for beginners

Note: You don't need to write JSON format, the system will generate it automatically.
auto_generate_desc: You only need to describe core requirements, the system will automatically generate:
auto_field_constraints: Field type constraints and validation rules
json_format_hint: JSON format should contain example values for all fields.
advanced_settings_desc: Configure AI generation prompts and other advanced options
field_management_desc: Define the fields required for cards
extraction_rules_desc: Define how AI extracts and generates content for each field
at_least_one_field: At least one field is required
field_purpose_placeholder: Describe the purpose and content requirements of this field
css_style_hint: Define card styles, supports all CSS features
import_external_dialog_desc: Please prepare a JSON file that meets the following rules before importing:
import_external_rule_1: Only supports the JSON structure of built-in templates (same as src/data/anki/builtin-templates.json).
import_external_rule_2: File content can be a single object or an array of objects; each object must contain fields_json and field_extraction_rules_json string fields.
import_external_rule_3: Common fields (example): id, name, description, author, version, preview_front, preview_back, note_type, fields_json, generation_prompt, front_template, back_template, css_style, field_extraction_rules_json, created_at, updated_at, is_active, is_built_in, preview_data_json.
import_external_rule_4: fields_json must be a JSON string of a field array (e.g. "[\"Front\",\"Back\"]"); field_extraction_rules_json must be a JSON string of field extraction rules.
import_external_rule_5: Templates with the same name are overwritten by default; uncheck "Overwrite existing templates" to skip existing items.
export_dialog_desc: Select templates to export, save as JSON file for other users to import via external import.

card.flip_hint: Tap to flip for the other side

editor.save_before_apply: Please save the template before applying it

check_status_all_imported: ✅ All complex templates have been imported!
refresh_done: Refresh complete! Currently showing {{count}} templates. If the count is still incorrect, please retry or restart the app.
delete_confirm_again: Template "{{name}}" will be deleted. Click delete again within 8 seconds to confirm.
import_migrated_notice: Template import has been unified into the database migration system. Please use the import button directly.

json_preview.title: JSON Preview
json_preview.subtitle: Paste JSON with template_id and data to instantly preview multiple templates with real content
json_preview.input_desc: Recommended structure: [{ template_id, data }, ...] or { "cards": [...] }. Keys in data should match template fields.
json_preview.example_hint: Tweak the sample JSON then click preview
json_preview.empty: Enter JSON on the left and click preview
json_preview.data_invalid: Data for template {{id}} must be an object. Check data/fields or flattened keys.
json_preview.no_items: No card data found in JSON

preview_sample_front: Sample Question: What is machine learning?
preview_sample_back: Machine learning is a branch of artificial intelligence that enables computers to learn from data and make predictions.
preview_sample_notes: This is a basic concept card about machine learning
save_with_errors_confirm: Template has errors. Are you sure you want to save?
field_extraction_json_help: Define field extraction rules in JSON format

minimal_card.Front: What is the law of conservation of momentum?
minimal_card.Back: In a system with no external forces, the total momentum remains constant
minimal_card.Notes: Supplementary explanation for the physics concept of momentum conservation.

code_card.Question: How to define a function in Python?
code_card.Notes: Basic syntax for Python function definition

cloze_card.Text: The formula for Newton's second law is {{c1::F = ma}}, where m represents {{c2::mass}}, and a represents {{c3::acceleration}}
cloze_card.Hint: Remember the three elements of Newton's second law
cloze_card.Notes: The relationship between force, mass, and acceleration

choice_card.Front: Which of the following is Newton's first law?
choice_card.Explanation: Newton's first law, also known as the law of inertia, states that an object remains at rest or in uniform linear motion unless acted upon by an external force.

language_learning_card.Example: 朝、友達に「こんにちは」と言いました。
language_learning_card.Context: Used for greeting during the daytime

medical_terminology_card.Definition: A disease state where blood pressure is persistently above normal range

historical_events_card.Causes: Overthrow Qing Dynasty, establish a republic
historical_events_card.Consequences: Ended over two thousand years of feudal monarchy in China
historical_events_card.Significance: A major turning point in Chinese history

math_formulas_card.Name: Pythagorean Theorem
math_formulas_card.Description: In a right triangle, the sum of squares of two legs equals the square of the hypotenuse
math_formulas_card.Variables: a, b are legs, c is the hypotenuse
math_formulas_card.Application: Calculate sides of a right triangle

legal_articles_card.Law: Civil Code of the People's Republic of China
legal_articles_card.Content: In order to protect the lawful rights and interests of civil subjects, regulate civil relations, maintain social and economic order, adapt to the development requirements of socialism with Chinese characteristics, promote core socialist values, and in accordance with the Constitution, this law is formulated.
legal_articles_card.Interpretation: Establishes the legislative purpose and value orientation of the Civil Code

concept_comparison_card.Similarities: Both are branches of AI, both require data training
concept_comparison_card.DifferencesA: Includes various algorithms, not limited to neural networks
concept_comparison_card.ApplicationB: Image recognition, natural language processing, etc.

multi_step_tutorial.Title: How to Configure Git Environment
multi_step_tutorial.Overview: Complete Git installation and basic configuration

Steps.details: Download the version suitable for your system from the official website
Create SSH key for GitHub authentication
Steps.warning: Keep your private key safe, do not share it with others

code_debug_exercise.Title: Python List Index Out of Range
code_debug_exercise.CorrectCode:
my_list = [1, 2, 3]
print(my_list[2])  # or use len() to check
code_debug_exercise.Explanation: List indexing starts from 0, the maximum index for a list of length 3 is 2

defaults.Text: Elements of social work include: 1. {{c1::Social Workers}}: providers of services and help; 2. {{c2::Clients}}: people who encounter difficulties and need help.
defaults.Hint: Remember the two basic elements of social work.
defaults.Question: Which of the following is Newton's first law?
